name: Acute Hypoxic Respiratory Failure with Sepsis
chief_complaint: I can't breathe and I feel extremely weak
prognosis: Guarded, depends on rapid response to treatment and underlying cause. Mortality rate ~40% in severe cases.
description: Life-threatening condition combining acute respiratory failure (PaO2 <60 mmHg on room air) with systemic inflammatory response from infection. Often develops from severe pneumonia or other infections. Requires immediate ICU-level care.
multiple_choice: Acute Hypoxic Respiratory Failure with Sepsis
